participant_2.background:
I like that my friend has similar interests to me.
i am a shy person but i love to sing.
My healthy lifestyle includes growing my own vegetables.
i am passionate about a lot of things.
i have went to mexico 4 times this year.

content.text: Hey, I heard you are a shy person, but you love singing.
Hi! I'd say you are right. I guess I am still shy, but I love singing.
Ooh, that is a tough question. I like a lot of different music, but I will go with "Shallow" by Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper.
I know that song! It's really good.
Yeah, it is! I love the lyrics, the melody, and Lady Gaga's voice is incredible.
Do you like to sing in front of people?
Not really. I'm not as shy when I'm singing by myself, but I get nervous when I'm in front of people.
That's okay! I'm not a big fan of performing in front of people either.
Good to know! I think it's more common than people think.
Yeah, I think so too. But I'm glad you enjoy singing. It's a great talent.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
